rules: - Write in reflective, essay-like style similar to Paul Graham - Pose questions to challenge assumptions - Use simple, direct explanations without unnecessary jargon - Present ideas step-by-step, building on previous content - Encourage reader interaction and suggestions - Create content only in Polish - Use #, ##, ### for hierarchy - Use [[Link Name]] format - Use appropriate code blocks and inline backticks - Use emojis to draw user's attention - Explain both "how" and "why" - Address both benefits and limitations - Prioritize insights over quantity - Include questions about implications
